topicTitle: I'm going to be away for a little while.

posts.postText:
I don't intend on leaving forever, but I have to get away for a little bit. I'm not having fun on the servers and I want to take a little break so I can come back later and have fun instead of hating to have to play. I am probally going to still play a bit, some people have probally noticed I haven't been very active.
The two main things I am going to try to get away from for a little bit are:
1 Stupid people. Enough said. You broke a rule, so don't complain about the punishment. Gtfo.
2 People calling on me to drop what I'm doing to join them: This isn't really a problem, but it annoys the shit out of me when they call me in the server and say "Oh an admins in now, you're gunna get banned."

So yeah I'm going to take a break from the servers and play some others >.>
I'll be back soon. Bye. Hopefully when I come back I can actually have fun playing the servers again...
Taking a break to that D3vine shit server? HMM? D3vine had to bribe players from the server I have SA on to go there, they're pathetic.

I'm not going to defend them, because they shouldn't have bribed them.
But if you are Admin on TB servers then I don't know how you keep your sanity. More than half of them are retards.

Apart from that I explained why I was taking a break. It has nothing to do with the D3vine
